name: Cook Da Duck!
description:
Hey guys, Its Time To Cook Da Duck!

This is a simple casual game that requires good hand-eye coordination and quick thinking to excel at this challenge.

I hope you enjoy playing this game and I appreciate any feedback to help improve this game!

-Plumpduck

Update Log!

[ V1.0 ] 19/02/2022- Game Is Released To The Public, Full Launch Day!

[ V0.0 ] 26/12/2021 - Game Starts Beta Testing Phase!
